title: You Can Dance
subtle: Concept (nonfiction), 24 words, Level A (Grade K), Lexile BR50L
description: In You Can Dance, readers learn about some of the many movements involved in dancing. Simple sentences; delightful, supportive illustrations; and high-frequency words offer student support. Use this book to discuss dancing as a great form of exercise while also teaching students about identifying the main idea and details and using verbs.
reviewWords: bend, dance, hop, leap, prance, skip, spin, step
comprehension: Main Idea and Details                : Identify main idea and details
awareness: Initial Sound                : Discriminate initial consonant /d/ sound
wordWork: High-Frequency Words : Identify and use the high-frequency word can
